segments.text: Could you show me where the ice cream is located ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just go to the end of the store . And it will be on your right . We have all the ice creams and frozen foods back there in the freezers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is my first time here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please notice all of our aisles are numbered and classified by signs on the ceiling . That might help you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad I asked you . So this is aisle 6 where I can find all the canned fruits and vegetables .
segments.speaker: S1
